short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a download button to CalPoly Pomona video players

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download videos directly from CalPoly Pomona video players with just two-clicks.

Simply install then open up any CPP video player on Canvas or Streaming @ CPP. A new download button should appear on the lower right corner. Select which resolution you would like to download the video in and your download will begin.

The top-most option provides the highest quality available. Most videos will also offer a "Source" option which provides a download of the original content exactly as it was uploaded.

This extension is fully open source and licensed under GPLv3. Check out the code here: https://github.com/joshgarde/Download.cpp
